original_text: Remember that God's message did not start from you in Corinth! You are not the only people who have heard it, either. 14: Remember that God's message did not start from you in Corinth! You are not the only people who have heard it, either.
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀이 너희로부터 난 것이냐 또는 너희에게만 임한 것이냐

sentences.original_text: Remember that God's message did not start from you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 메시지가 너희로부터 시작되지 않았다는 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: You are not the only people
